p: Reviewer #1: This paper presents results of a qualitative study of community perceptions of an Ebola treatment center in Sierra Leone during the 2014-2015 outbreak. The topic is timely given the challenges of containing the earlier W. Africa outbreak, as well as the significant barriers to responding to the current outbreak in DRC. The paper is well written and organized, and provides a compelling narrative of community perceptions and experiences.
